text:
@realDonaldTrump 330 Million Americans & only 6.5 million #coronavirus tests brings many questions..

👉How many are repeat tests?
👉How many Americans have been tested?
👉How many tests made in WH & Trump's family?
👉Does Trump have himself tested everyday?

#CoronavirusOutbreak @maddow @JoeNBC
